databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT MS_SI_EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND.MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID, MS_SI_EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND.EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND_ID,
MS_SI_EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND.DELETE_FLAG, MS_SI_EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND.USER_KEY, MS_SI_EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND.DATA_NO, MS_SI_EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND.SEND_FLAG, MS_SI_EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND.VESSEL_ID, MS_SI_EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND.RENEW_DATE, MS_SI_EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_SI_EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND.TS
FROM MS_SI_EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND
WHERE MS_SI_EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO MS_SI_EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND(
MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID , EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND_ID ,
DELETE_FLAG , USER_KEY , DATA_NO , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES(
:MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID , :EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND_ID ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :USER_KEY , :DATA_NO , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SI_EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND
SET
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID = :MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID AND EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND_ID = :EXCLUDE_MENJOU_KIND_ID AND TS = :TS
